sentences.english: Well, the reason I think essentially is again back to the civilization state.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我认为实质上，原因得再次追溯到这文明国家。

sentences.english: Dr Metcalfe did not make money from the actual invention of Ethernet.
sentences.chinese: 梅特卡夫博士并没有从以太网的实质发明中赚钱。

sentences.english: Substance of critical thinking is evaluation and comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 批判性思维的实质是评价性和综合性。

sentences.english: Theory of water-blend heavy oil and combustion mechanism were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对重油掺水乳化的实质及乳化油燃烧过程进行了探讨。

sentences.english: Rural land brought to market illegally is actualy a kind of reasonable system innovation.
sentences.chinese: 农地非法入市实质上是一项合理的诱致性的制度变迁。

sentences.english: In essence, the concept I’m talking about is flying without a net.
sentences.chinese: 实质上，我谈论的是自由飞行的概念。

sentences.english: And the idea is he has economic codependence with these people.
sentences.chinese: 这句话是实质是他和这些人有经济互依性。

sentences.english: Separate the essence of the test from the implementation details.
sentences.chinese: 将要测试的业务实质内容与实现细节相分离。

sentences.english: What is the texture of your experience?
sentences.chinese: 这次经历的实质是什么？

sentences.english: The thrid chapter analyses the effects and substances of the special status of royal women.
sentences.chinese: 第三章探讨了皇室女性特殊地位的影响和实质。

sentences.english: Appearance is apt to lead one to misjudge the substance.
sentences.chinese: 表面现象使人对实质判断错误。

sentences.english: Third chapter mainly analyzed the content of the substance freedom.
sentences.chinese: 第三章重点浅析浅析森的实质自由观的内容。

sentences.english: The same sex, the real human self-love.
sentences.chinese: 同性爱，实质是人类的自爱。

sentences.english: The essence of French savoir-vivre is simplicity.
sentences.chinese: 法国人的处世之道的实质就是淳朴。

sentences.english: Essentially, Article 356 Of Penal Code stipulates special recidivist.
sentences.chinese: 刑法典第三百五十六条实质上是关于特别累犯的规定。

sentences.english: In fact, the volcanic rock zone is a fault subsidence basin zone in tectonic sense.
sentences.chinese: 就构造意义而言，火山带实质上是断陷盆地带。

definition: entity/substance/thing that has a material existence (as opposed to a conceptual, virtual or online existence)/the real thing (as opposed to an image or model of it)
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
